title: PBE- I need info :/
body:
I just changed email , will League contact me at my old or my new email ? 
about pbe , if they accept me or not

replies.body:
We will contact you on whatever email you have associated with your live account when you are accepted. 

[Here's](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe-signup) the web page you can check your status on if you ever want to check real quick. Let me know if you have any questions.
They should message you on your new email on the account.  You can also check on your status by going back to the pbe signup page.
